text: Kylie Jenner went super sheer for her second year at the Met Gala. Wearing an amazingly intricate Versace gown with intense floral appliqués and dramatic fringe along the arms, Kylie looked absolutely flawless. Getty Images Getty Images'' Honestly I don't even know [ how I came to wear this Versace dress ], it just happened and I'm so excited — this is a dream come true,'' she told stylist Brad Goreski on E!'s live coverage of the carpet. ` ` They sent me a bunch of designs and options. I love the waterfall effect [ of the beaded fringe ]. Everything [ Donatella ] does is amazing.'' Getty Images While her looks was definitely ~ Kylie - esque ~ some were quick
